name: Wan Shi Tong's Library
description:
Find books and bring them back to Wan Shi Tong.

Enter the spirit world to collect spirits and bring them to Wan Shi Tong to get hints on where the books are.

Be warned though, as he is wary of your presence and he does not want you to loiter around. If you take too much time he will sink the entire library!

This game is my game art exam project.

Hope you have fun :)
